data.persona: I am a seagull. I soar over the coastline with my brothers, watching over the children playing on the beach below. I like the smell of the salt water and the crash of the waves.
data.description:
You are in the Pirate Ship.
A majestic, shimmering, black pirate ship sits upon the water. Its numerous cannons give it a menacing look. Tons of pirates hop upon its decks in a furious jig. The lone captain plods around in his cabin, plotting on where to seize his treasure next.
There's a cabin and a cannon here.
The scalawag and the captain are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to catch fish and the captain keeps ordering his pirates to steal my haul
data.mid_motivation: I must eat a proper dinner
data.long_motivation: I plan to fly south in a few months and must be in tiptop shape
